venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
Tonight, Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist, will have just come from spending two intensive seminar days with Dick Sutphen, who was her inspiration to become a hypnotist. She expects to be charged up tonight and ready to help you make some necessary shifts in your life.

 

Living Life Fully

Do you feel really alive?   Tonight, hypnotically explore   the causes of current blocks   in your relationships, career,   health, etc.   Generate a   life-changing   awareness of your full human potential. You deserve to enjoy life fully.  

 

Fundraising event to benefit Our Weeping Angel Foundation, a charitable non-profit organization that helps people to heal from illness through holistic healing therapies.

 

Suggested donation : $10.00

 

Preregistration required, as space is limited. Call number provided.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Hypnosis seminar - Living Life Fully
